metadata.title: CVE-2018-6544 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: pdf_load_obj_stm in pdf/pdf-xref.c in Artifex MuPDF 1.12.0 could referencethe object stream recursively and therefore run out of error stack, whichallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted PDFdocument.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
